titleStmt.title: A warning to England and to all that profess themselves Christians, who have the form, but deny the power of godliness, that they sin no more, lest a worse thing come to them. Let this be speedily dispersed. George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
